description: Non-material amendments to planning permission reference 20/0276/FUL dated 07/06/21 for 'Construction of a building of part 7, part 9, part 13 and part 16 storeys to comprise 343 residential homes and 578.5sqm GIA of commercial floorspace (Use Classes A1 to A4, B1, B2, D1 and D2), including associated car and cycle parking and landscaping.' Amendments include: Increase commercial floorspace by 39sqm; Amendments to landscaping design to the linear park between cores D1 and D2 and the Podium; Increase in height of rooftop plant: Changes to window and door widths to core D4 and D6 onto new amenity rooftop level 9 of D5
site_name: Buildings D3-D7 Beaufort ParkAerodrome RoadLondonNW9 5JH
